```{r setup}
library(forcis)
```




```{r 'import-data'}
## Define filename path ----
file_path <- system.file("extdata", "example_dataset.csv", package = "forcis")

## Read CSV file ----
dat <- readr::read_csv(file = file_path)

## Explore dataset ----
dim(dat)

colnames(dat)
```
